name: Chinese Ink Painting Puzzle & Creator / 國畫拼圖創作家
name_original: Chinese Ink Painting Puzzle & Creator / 國畫拼圖創作家
description:
Chinese Ink Painting Puzzle & Creator is a Chinese traditional style puzzle create game.
In the game part, there are tens of puzzle wait you to solve.
In the creation part, you can unlock hundreds of elements to build your own ink painting masterpiece.
Also you can upload works to workshop and download other's works from workshop.Or just get special code for every works, send it to others, restore it and continue the creation.
You will find so much fun and peace feeling through it.
Wish you like it!Key Features
  • Learn making a ink painting works through play.
Dozens of puzzle challenges is waiting for you. Through it you are not only play puzzle game but also learn how to make a ink painting.

  • You can be a ink painting creator.
Unlock hundreds of elements to create your own masterpiece.Elements are classified into eight kinds :"Rock, Animal, Tree, Water, Pavilion, Insect, Bridge Boat, Character, Backgrounds and poetry".

  • Share your masterpiece to world.
Upload your works to Steam Workshop or download other's works and play it. Get more rank and score in Leaderboard.

  • Cooperate with you friends.
Get a special code of any creation and send to friends,they can restore an editable picture and continue to improve it.

  • challenge you friends.
Lock a special code to make a challenge puzzle and send to your friend.
